eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.bestiary

Class ObservationTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.bestiary.ObservationTracker

  • public class ObservationTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to track the progress of the rank representing the detail level of a bestiary entry.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      ObservationTracker()

      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateProgressLore(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, WauzBestiaryEntry entry)
      Generates a list of lores to display the observation rank progress of a mob for a given player.
      static void tryToAddProgress(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
      Adds progress to the observation rank of the killed mob, if it has a valid bestiary entry.

    • Method Detail

      • tryToAddProgress

        public static void tryToAddProgress(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Adds progress to the observation rank of the killed mob, if it has a valid bestiary entry. Also grants the fitting rewards when completed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who defeated the entity.
        entity - The entity that was defeated.

      • generateProgressLore

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateProgressLore(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                    WauzBestiaryEntry entry)
        Generates a list of lores to display the observation rank progress of a mob for a given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the observation rank progress for.
        entry - The bestiary entry of the mob.
        Returns:
        The list of progress lores.
